dialogues.text: Grrrrrrrr! Grrrr! N’GOO (mock fear) Oh no what is happening! It is an actual demon from Hell! And, then -- (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Two more guys in costumes run out of the bar. One is a MUMMY. The other wears a pink RABBIT costume with fangs glued to it and a thick frown drawn with a Sharpie over its eyes. They growl and wave their arms in an unconvincing manner. - N‘GOO Oh no! What am I going to do?! I’m forced into throwing peanuts! In a feigned panic, N’Goo throws a bowl of peanuts at the monsters. The Mummy clutches his eye.

dialogues.speaker: MUMMY
dialogues.text: Ow! N‘GOO But it does no good! My life is in danger! They are coming to eat my very soul! The monsters crowd in on N’Goo. The "Demon" bumps into a coffee table. N’Goo turns to the officers. N‘’GOO See? This is all that happened.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: But... like... that isn’t what happened... like at all! They weren’t bad actors in costumes!

dialogues.speaker: RABBIT
dialogues.text: Four years at Yale Drama, pal.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: These guys have zippers on their backs! N‘GOO Yes, but in the darkness of night... oh ho!

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Last night they were... big! N‘GOO (to Raimondo) One of our actors, Stuart, is not here today. He is six-foot-three. You don’t want to meet him in a dark alley. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: They had teeth... they breathed The "Demon" presses a bulb under his arm and a green spray sprays out of a tube on his chin. Raimondo returns his notebook to his pocket. He gives Shaggy a hard stare and speaks to Fitzgibbon.

dialogues.speaker: RAIMONDO
dialogues.text: Let’s go.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: Lieutenant. Our friends Fred and Velma are missing. Now until that mystery is solved, I suggest you unholster your notebook. Okay?

dialogues.speaker: MUMMY
dialogues.text: Fred and Velma? I saw them this morning, over at Dead Mike’s. Daphne gawks at the Mummy. EXT. DEAD MIKE’S SPORTS BAR - LATER Dead Mike’s is a bright, splashy, island bar, a mixed aesthetic of sports teams and horror. Its logo is a neon skull with baseball bat crossbones. We hear the MUSIC of SPANDAU BALLET’s "True." INT. DEAD MIKE’S SPORTS BAR - LATER Fred sings karaoke melodramatically into a microphone. His ascot is gone. His hair is shorter, above his ear.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: ‘So funny how it seems Always in time But never in line for dreams Head over heels when toe to toe This is the sound of my soul! This is the sound!’ Velma ENTERS FRAME, also with a microphone. Her hair is in abun. She’s wearing makeup and a sun dress. She thrusts her fist in front of her, singing with gusto. The crowd whoops and applauds. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: ‘I bought a ticket to the world! But now I’ve come back again!’

dialogues.speaker: FRED/VELMA
dialogues.text: ‘Why do we find it hard to write the next line? Oh we want the truth to be said!’

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY, SCOOBY, AND DAPHNE
dialogues.text: stand in the rear of the crowd, staring in numbed shock. Raimondo and Fitzgibbon are with them. Velma and Fred grip hands as they sing the chorus together.

dialogues.speaker: FRED/VELMA
dialogues.text: ‘Huh huh huh hu-uh huh We know this much is true Huh huh huh hu-uh huh We know this much is true’

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Zoinks! They’ve been brainwashed! The demons have a hypno-wheel!

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: (confused, disturbed) I’m going to... the ladies’ room. Raimondo and Fitzgibbon start to leave.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Wait! Shaggy notices a pretty young woman beyond Raimondo. She’s clapping and singing along with Fred and Velma.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Isabel?! Isabel turns toward him. Her hair is now straight down and conservative. Her makeup is tasteful eye shadow. Her clothes are a colorful sweater-skirt combination.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Oh, hi!

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: You're here?! Why’d you leave that phone message?! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Isabel giggles.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: I just thought the show was real for a minute, and, whoopsie!

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: What happened to your hair? Your clothes?

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: It was time for a change! I mean, golly-wolly, I’m a teenager! We change all the time! Shaggy stares at her, confounded. He spots the Codst Guard walking out the front door.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Wait here, okay?! Just wait! INT. DEAD MIKE’S WOMEN’S REST ROOM - MOMENTS LATER Daphne stares at herself in the bathroom mirror. The faucet is running.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: Okay, Daphne... Chill out... There’s some reasonable expla... Oh, God. She leans over. She splashes water on her face. She lifts her head. Zarkos, the masked wrestler, is in the mirror. He’s standing behind her. He grabs her. He quickly pins her to the floor in a wrestling hold.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: No fair! Let go! This doesn’t count! I didn’t have time to summon my chi! EXT. DEAD MIKE’S SPORTS BAR - DAY Shaggy and Scooby follow Raimondo and Fitzgibbon as they pace quickly away from the bar. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Listen! There’s something wrong with this place! You have to take all of us with you off this island! Fitzgibbon speaks into a walkie-talkie.

dialogues.speaker: FITZGIBBON
dialogues.text: Moira, do a check on a Norville ‘Shaggy’ Rogers from Coolsville, Maryland.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: If you knew Fred and Velma or my cousin, you’d know that that was even weirder than eighteen-foot demons! Like, who says ‘Golly- wolly’?

dialogues.speaker: RAIMONDO
dialogues.text: Who says ‘zoinks’?

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Good roint.

dialogues.speaker: FITZGIBBON
dialogues.text: (into walkie-talkie) Yeah... yeah... thanks, Moira.

dialogues.speaker: RAIMONDO
dialogues.text: Rogers got a jacket?

dialogues.speaker: FITZGIBBON
dialogues.text: No... but the dog has three sheets. He’s wanted on leash law violations, overdue vaccines, no registration, two acts of defecating in the park --

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Scooby! Scooby shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: I rad do go.

dialogues.speaker: RAIMONDO
dialogues.text: Yeah, Rogers, we'll take you with us. But if we do, we got to put your mutt to sleep. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Rut I’m not rired. -

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Sleep, Scoob. Like what happened to Scrappy. Scooby yelps and bites his nails. Shaggy stops following them. He watches them go. He grudgingly starts back toward the bar.

dialogues.speaker: RAIMONDO AND FITZGIBBON
dialogues.text: turn the corner of the bar. N’Goo Tauna and a horde of tough henchman are standing there, waiting.

dialogues.speaker: RAIMONDO
dialogues.text: What the...? INT. DEAD MIKE’S SPORTS BAR - MOMENTS LATER Shaggy and Scooby enter. The place is suddenly abandoned. The stage is empty. The sports-horror theme is decidedly more spooky. Dummies in pro team uniforms hang from nooses. A giant shrunken head in a football helmet also dangles from the rafters.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Yipes. Where’d everybody go? Scooby sees Fred THROUGH a small window on the kitchen door. He bounds toward the doors.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Red! INT. DEAD MIKE’S KITCHEN Scooby enters the twin doors. He sees Fred, Velma, Isabel, and some college students gathered around a small table eating cereal.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Hey, Scooby! You guys missed a real kicky time last night!

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Ricky rime? Shaggy enters behind Scooby-Doo. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: The fellows in the demon costumes took us back to a big cavern, and we all had some scrumptious chocolate cake!

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: How could those be costumes? Fred, where’s your ascot?! Velma, you’re wearing makeup!

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Doesn’t a girl have a right to look pretty every now and then? Everybody laughs. Shaggy and Scooby look nervously at them. Velma turns away from them, gazing out a kitchen window, her back to them.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: You know, one thing those monsters did was pretty scary. Scooby stares at her, wondering.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: That blood-curdling scream they let out before they attacked.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: A ream? Velma looks over her shoulder at a confused Scooby-Doo.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: You know, sort of like... Velma opens her mouth and releases a loud, piercing sereech. Her eyes wash over into a bright red. Shaggy and Scooby holler. They look around them: Fred stands, throwing back his chair. Isabel jumps onto the table, crouching like a panther. Their eyes are all red. They all screech.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Rixnort caal ene, topara! Ekenchumen, riko! Shaggy and Scooby run. The possessed humans take chase. Shaggy trips, but the horde just runs over his body. They seem only to care about Scooby. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Scooby gallops toward a bucket of Pine-Sol at the end of a long industrial metal table for preparing food. He scoops up the bucket and throws it onto the metal counter. He jumps onto the counter, the Pine-gol a lubricant easing his slide down its length and toward a fire exit. Scooby slides past a long hero sandwich and OUT OF FRAME. Quickly, Scooby reemerges IN the FRAME. The sight of the sandwich has made him forget everything.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Momm ! Scooby grabs a piece. Shaggy yells at him from the floor.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Forget the sandwich! Get out of here! Scooby sees the horde nearing him. He leaps off the counter toward the fire exit. He slams through it. The FIRE ALARM SOUNDS. EXT. CLIFF BEHIND DEAD MIKE’S Scooby runs out onto a small area of grassland. The rear of Dead Mike’s sits directly on the end of an enormous cliff, hundreds of yards up from the rocky ocean. Scooby almost runs off it. He turns to see his possessed friends circling him. He stands on his hind legs, trapped. INT. DEAD MIKE’S KITCHEN Shaggy can see out the open door, where the possessed humans approach Scooby. He searches around the room.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Oh boy oh boy. Oh boy. Oh... Shaggy looks at a wall phone. It has a very long cord. He snatches the receiver off the hook. He ties the cord around his waist. Shaggy takes a deep breath. He darts outside.  69. EXT. CLIFF BEHIND DEAD MIKE’S Shaggy runs between the possessed humans.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Hold on, Scoob! Shaggy grabs Scooby and jumps with him off the edge of the cliff. Scooby clamps onto Shaggy. They fall, screaming, for a bit (it’s an extraordinarily long phone cord). Then they snap to a sudden stop. Shaggy and Scooby peer down at the waves crashing up against the rocky cliffs. They swing back and forth.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: This stinks. Scooby gazes up at the red-eyed humans, growling.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Rhy are Relma and Red in ruch a rad mood?

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: That’s not a bad mood, Scooby! They’re like demons!

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Remons!? Scooby screams at the top of his lungs for a long time. Shaggy stares at him, nonplussed. They start to rise. They look up. Fred is slowly yanking them back up. Shaggy fishes in his pocket for something. He pulls out a Red Cross knife.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Remember when we took those diving lessons, Scoob? Shaggy starts to cut the phone cord.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Ro.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: No?! The cord is cut. Shaggy and Scooby scream as they fall. Scooby plummets, spinning in the air, trying to get his bearings. Finally, he does; he dives straight down. Shaggy and Scooby hit the ocean.  70.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shaggy and Scooby submerge deep into the water.

dialogues.speaker: .EXT. BEACH
dialogues.text: Scooby and Shaggy lope onto the shore. Scooby rubs his head in pain, a bit angry.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Roo rurt ry read.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: I what?!

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Rurt ry read.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: You know, Scoob, that’s the type of thing that pisses -- that’s like a little bit like not grateful, don’t you think?

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: It ruts!

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: I just saved your life, man!

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: You rew re off a riff!

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: I went back for you! Which is unlike -- I’11 tell you this, man -- very unlike what you did when I got stuck in that vase. You just ran away like a little baby!

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Rou’re a rittle raby.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: You are!

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Rou are!

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Shut up, Scooby. Velma’s right. You are a moron. Scooby is very hurt by this. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Rhat?

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: You heard me. Scooby, tears in his eyes, picks up a handful of sand and throws it at Shaggy.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Hey!

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: I rate roo! Scooby darts away from Shaggy, crying.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Scooby! Scooby disappears into the forest. Shaggy spots thick metal cables running along the shoreline. They lead into a dark hole in a mountainside.

dialogues.speaker: . SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Hypno-wheel. (into woods) Scooby, while you’re in there moping I’m going to see where these cables go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shaggy follows the metal cables into a short hole in the side of the cavern. He crawls into the hole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shaggy can barely see. We hear a SCREAM. He stands beside doorways lining the wall, similar to where Isabel was in the beginning of the film. He uses his hand to follow the cables on the ground. Suddenly, he. falls, sliding down an incline and into a gushing stream. Shaggy tries to stay above water, looking up to the hole above him.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Scooby! He drifts through a dark cavity leading into a cavern.  72.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The stream ends in a pool in this cavern belly, which is hundreds of yards in diameter and hundreds of yards high. Shaggy stops by a boulder pile beside the pool. He crawls to his knees. He spots the metal cables emerging from the pool. He peeks around the corner of the boulder pile to see where they lead. He spies something horrible: Raimondo, Fitzgibbon, and a few students are strapped by weathered leather straps and metal buckles into rectangular wooden slabs in the upright vertical position. Nine such slabs encircle the room. A hideous demon stands beside each of the slabs. Raimondo struggles against the straps.

dialogues.speaker: RAIMONDO
dialogues.text: Get me out of here! The cables lead to a control station, a rusty metal box with a door and a large lock. Zarkos uses a key -- exactly like the one hanging from Mondavarious’ belt -- to open the door. He steps into the control box. He puts his hands on the controls there. The Soul Snatcher, an upright metal device with an enormous pincer on the end, is in front of the control station. Zarkos works the controls; the pincer cranes upward. Zarkos guides the pincer toward Raimondo’s chest.

dialogues.speaker: RAIMONDO
dialogues.text: loooeco0! The pincer mystically -- that is, without bodily injury -- enters Raimondo’s chest. The pincer glows. It twists, digs, searches for something. The pincer clamps shut; Raimondo’s body falls limp. But, strangely, though his mouth has stopped moving, we still hear him, MUFFLED, SCREAMING. The pincer emerges from his chest, pulling something translucent white and incandescent out of Raimondo. It yanks the substance like warm taffy through a pinhole. Eventually, it’s free. We GAZE UPON... Raimondo’s soul. It likes like Raimondo’s head, with a wispy spiral tail. He is still screaming; he stops when he sees his own limp body in front of him. RAIMONDO’S SOUL Hey! What the --? You’re taking my _ soul out of my body?! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The demon standing beside Raimondo’s body shoves his head down the throat. He shoves his arms inside. It’s an ugly sight, but he gradually squeezes his whole shape through Raimondo’s mouth and into the soulless husk. The pincer swings Raimondo’s soul over to the Soul Stew, an eight foot high rusty iron van that sits in the center ef the room. It’s filled with a white, mystical brew. DIM VOICES ECHO from it. The pincer stuffs Raimondo’s shell-shocked soul into the Soul Stew. Raimondo’s body’s eyes open. Workers unstrap him. Raimondo manipulates his face, getting used to being in the body. He rotates his shoulders. He sits up.

dialogues.speaker: RAIMONDO
dialogues.text: Ak orton. He wiggles his fingers. In stilted English:

dialogues.speaker: RAIMONDO
dialogues.text: Flesh-ee. Shaggy sinks back against the boulder, afraid to even breathe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A muddied Scooby-Doo crosses the forest. He hears:

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Scooby! Daphne is crouched in the bushes beside him.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Raphre! Tears well up in Scooby’s eyes.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Raggy rurt ry reelings! Daphne extends her hand toward Scooby.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: It’ll be okay. Come with me, puppy - Scooby hesitantly puts his paw in her hand. He looks behind him, to see if Shaggy has followed. Daphne’s eyes turn red behind him.  74.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shaggy continues to watch from behind the boulder pile. The Upper Crust Coed who sat next to Scooby on the plane appears in a doorway.

dialogues.speaker: COED
dialogues.text: Bort r-Immin tarken. The possessed Coast Guard and students follow her through the doorway. Everyone’s gone. Shaggy takes a deep breath for courage. He steps out of the pool of water. Shaggy creeps up the steps to the Soul Stew. He puts his hands on the edge of the vat. Peers down into it.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: zZoinks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside the vat are hundreds of SOULS, white translucent faces, swirling, agonized, SCREAMING and CHATTERING and WHISPERING their secrets.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: notices Velma’s Soul, circling. VELMA’S SOUL Shaggy! Give me a hand! Get me out of here! It circles up and away from Shaggy and then swings back around again.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: How?! VELMA’S SOUL Don’t tell me all those years of video games haven’t given you eye- hand coordination! Shaggy fearfully, yet with amazing reflexes, plunges his hand in the vat and snatches up Velma’s Soul. He holds it up. She’s dizzy. VELMA’S SOUL Oh, man. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Fred said it was a hypno-wheel! I would have never come if I knew there was a thing that pulled a you out of you and put a mean thing inside of it! VELMA’S SOUL Stop with the technical jargon.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: What?! VELMA’S SOUL Get the others. They should be on the top layer, since we were the last ones put in there.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: What about you? VELMA’S SOUL If my instincts are correct, just let me go. We’1ll meet you on the beach at the base of the mountain.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Let go? Velma nods. Shaggy, unsure, releases her soul. She shoots away in a dazzling trichromatic streak of light and out of the cavern.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Evil Daphne and her cohorts carry a bamboo pole with an upset Scooby-Doo tied upside down to it. He gulps. Evil Velma follows, overseeing things. They all sing:

dialogues.speaker: HUMANS
dialogues.text: Ko reeka gort an alla soy Go balli lala gingo hoy A raefa morr ay ach otee This demon world forever be! The multicolored streak of Velma’s Soul zips behind them, smack into the possessed Velma’s face. None of the other humans notice as she’s knocked off her feet. Velma’s Soul oozes into the mouth of the prone Velma. It travels through her neck like a rat through a snake. The body quakes and, suddenly... (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: A monstrous demon springs from her chest. Slats of daylight stream down through the limbs of trees beside the demon. Where the light meets the demon’s body, the demon burns. He opens his mouth to scream, but instead ’ EXPLODES into glowing, protoplasmic chunks. Velma covers her face to protect herself; but the chunks dissipate into nothing. She looks at the others, still carrying Scooby down the forest pathway. They’ve noticed nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shaggy snatches another soul out of the vat. It’s’a MAN’S SOUL. MAN’S SOUL You’ve saved me! Thank you! Thank you so much!

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Sorry, I’m, uh, looking for my friend. Shaggy stuffs the Man’s Soul back into the stew. He grabs another. It’s FRED’S SOUL. Shaggy holds it upside down by its wispy spinal tail. Fred is, to say the least, rattled.

dialogues.speaker: FRED'S SOUL
dialogues.text: Listen, man! I think someone spiked my root beer with crack last night, and I’m having like a -- a bad trip!

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Shhhi FRED’S SOUL Talk me down, pal! I’m having a ‘bummer’ !

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Sbh. A demon took over your body. FRED’S SOUL A ‘demon’? Shaggy, cut the superstitious claptrap! At the end of every paranormal claim there are only fools seeking fame, paranoid -- (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Fred, you’re a frigging see- ~ through protoplasmic head! Shaggy looks around, afraid someone heard.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Sorry... Shhh... Um... bye? FRED’S SOUL What? Shaggy releases Fred’s Soul. It flies off in a colorful streak. INT. FRED’S HOTEL BATHROOM The possessed Fred is in the steamed-up shower, sponging himself and singing along to the song on the radio, TEARS FOR FEARS "Everybody Wants to Rule the World." Fred’s SOUL WHOOSHES into the bathroom. It smacks against the shower door and bounces off. FRED’S SOUL ow! Unable to get in the shower, it flies out of the bathroom. INT. FRED’S HOTEL ROOM Fred’s Soul ricochets around the hotel room. FRED’S SOUL Ow!... Owl... Owl... Ow! Then it bounces out the open window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shaggy yanks DAPHNE’S SOUL out of the vat. She’s pissed. DAPHNE’S SOUL Put me back, Shaggy! I don’t want to be saved again! I’11 figure a way out myself!

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Like, how? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: DAPHNE’S SOUL I‘ll, I don’t know, use my tongue as an oar to swim to the edge!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daphne and the other demons carry Scooby on the bamboo pole into the staff door Isabel and Mandy sneaked into at the beginning of the film. Velma tails them. She leaves the door open behind her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The possessed humans carry Scooby down the corridor. They pass a few doorways. Velma spots a bright, streaking soul approaching. She hops ahead of the rest, into a small room. Ag they pass it, Velma surreptitiously yanks in the possessed Daphne. The rest of the humans walk by without noticing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The room is very dark. The soul flies into Daphne’s face. Daphne’s body shivers. An ENORMOUS DEMON pops out of her chest. Only this time he doesn’t explode. The Demon looks at Daphne.

dialogues.speaker: DEMON
dialogues.text: Jonlovroen kantu... human! The Demon picks up the confused Daphne by the neck and slams her against the rocky wall.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Looks like you could use a little sun. The Demon turns angrily toward Velma. Velma has her hand on a light switch. She flicks it. The DEMON gazes worriedly at the ceiling’s flickering fluorescent bulb. He EXPLODES into dissipating chunks. Velma looks at Daphne. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: The demons can’t survive the ~ light. That’s why they need our bodies. Are you all right, Daphne?

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: Not quite.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: You're not all right?

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: No, I’m all right. But I’m not quite Daphne. I’m Fred! Velma stares at her.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: I couldn’t get to my body. I panicked. I didn’t know where else to go! It’s difficult to steer when you’re pure spirit! Velma snickers. Daphne’s mood shifts as she realizes something. She runs her hands over her sides. She smiles.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: I can go look at myself naked! Holy God, I can try out things I never imagined in even most outlandish fantasies! I -- There’s a SLAM against the door. Velma opens it. Daphne’s Soul flies into the mouth of her body. Fred's Soul instantly pops out of her chest, and zooms out of the room. INT. FRED’S HOTEL BATHROOM Fred steps out of the shower, drying himself, still singing. He looks up, surprised, and sees Fred’s Soul zooming toward him. FRED’S SOUL Bite me! Fred’s Soul slams into his mouth, knocking him over.  80.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daphne stares at Velma, upset. She shudders.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: He was in my body?! Did he touch anything?!

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Just your boobies a little bit. Daphne does her best to pretend she’s aghast, but she’s obviously a little turned on. Velma peeks out the door.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Coast is clear. Let’s go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shaggy leans over the vat, searching futilely,.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Isabel?... Isabel?... Shoot! Shaggy hears something at the doorway. Zarkos enters the room. He doesn’t see Shaggy tiptoeing, disappearing through a passageway behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scooby-Do is using a white rock to scrawl a huge equation on the cavern wall. It reads: 12

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: = a drawing of Pikachu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Metal Head and two other possessed humans are playing a game at a folding table, using sinister-looking, octagonal cards. The Metal Head’s long locks are now a crew cut. Scooby catches his eye through the rusty metal bars between them. He points to the equation. The Metal head sees it and mellowly shakes his head now. Scooby looks around the murky dungeon. A mischievous look crosses his face; he has an idea. Scooby clutches his heart. He wheezes. He’s pretending to have a heart attack. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Rikes! I’m rying! ‘The guards stare blankly at him from their seats as he stumbles back and forth melodramatically. Scooby flips onto his back. He gasps for air like a dying fish, raspy and without shame. Then he "dies." The possessed humans continue staring, unmoved. After a moment, Scooby squinches open one eye.

dialogues.speaker: METAL HEAD
dialogues.text: It didn’t work the first eight times you did it either.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: I reary am dead rise rime.

dialogues.speaker: METAL HEAD
dialogues.text: Then why are you talking? Scooby slaps his paw to his face.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Rupid! . N’Goo opens the door beside the Metal Head. To Scooby: N’GOO Mr. Doo, Mondavarious will now be seeing you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shaggy steps out of the hole and onto the beach. He looks up and sees Fred, Velma, and Daphne standing, waiting for him. He stops, staring at them with resigned trepidation.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Tell me you’re you.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: Fred took over my body and touched my boobs!

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: They were itchy! And admit it, you’re into the thought. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Shaggy continues out of the hole, nodding.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: You’re you.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Did you get Isabel?

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: She, like, must have been at the bottom of the pot. I couldn’t see her. Where’s Scooby? They can’t look at him in the eye.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: N’goo opens a door. He leads Scooby into the room where Isabel was captured. Scooby is surprised by the craggy walls blanketed with Scooby-Doo memorabilia, photographs from his life, magazine articles, and so on. Mondavarious sits at a desk covered in gewgaws and clashing colors. He drinks a cup of tea.

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: Leave us alone, N‘Goo. N’Goo bows. Departs. Scooby points at himself on the cover of Dog Fancy magazine.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Rat‘’s re! He spots a photo of himself as a puppy with Shaggy.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Rat’s re! Mondavarious indicates a table with velvet cloth draped over it.

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: My friend. Join me. Truth awaits.  83.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gang has set up camp. Fred makes a fire out of twigs. -

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Daphne says you have some pages in Latin from Mondavarious’s castle.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Oh, right. Shaggy removes the wet pages from his pocket. He hands them to Velma. She looks at them. The gang gathers ‘round. Shaggy looks regretful.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: I shouldn’t‘ve yelled at Scooby.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: This isn’t really Latin. It’s a derivative of Latin.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: Can you read it?

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Most of it, yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mondavarious removes the velvet sheet to display a small scale model of the cavern belly, complete with miniature soul stew, soul snatcher, pewter demons, etc.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Reat-o! Mondavarious shows Scooby parts of the model.

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: The vat is comprised of human souls. We call it the soul stew. Scooby licks his lips, hungry.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Srew. Mmmmn.

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: At midnight tonight, through occult incantations, we evoke the soul tube! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Mondavarious flicks a switch on the side of the model. A holographic tube of souls pop up fromthe stew. It reaches up to the ceiling. Scooby looks up at it. He playfully dips his paw into it.

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: The soul tube is a shuttle, if you will, between earth and the demon realm. I’ve used sorcery to summon low-level demons over the years. But only through this tube can we transport the Demon Rex. Mondavarious flicks another switch. A red holographic Demon Rex slowly descends through the tunnel of souls. Scooby points to a plaster kitten, with a spring for a neck, on Mondavarious’s desk.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Rhat’s dat?

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: That’s a cat with a bobbing head. Scooby slaps its head, making it bob. It amuses hin.

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: Please don’t touch it. It has nothing to do with this. Mondavarious flicks another switch; holograms of other demons follow the Demon Rex down the tube.

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: The Demon Rex issues a powerful magnetic force which draws every other demon in a wake onto our earth. Then --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Velma reads the pages.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: ‘The demons shall disperse over the earth, replacing every human soul with a superior demonic one.’  85.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mondavarious is exuberant.

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: All human souls, that is, with the exception of myself, Zarkos and N’Goo Tauana. We shall be the Demon Rex's human acolytes! Scooby doesn’t quite get it.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Raggy ralled re a roron.

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: Don’t you see? You mustn’t worry yourself with these trifles any longer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Velma continues to read from the book.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: They can’t do it without this... ‘Great Canine,’ he -- Velma flips the page to reveal --

dialogues.speaker: ANCIENT ILLUSTRATION
dialogues.text: It is a dignified, well-muscled version of Scooby-Doo. Above the illustration it reads, "Magna Canis."

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Crikey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mondavarious gestures to the Scooby paraphernalia around hin.

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: You’re the Chosen One, Scooby-Doo! Hand-picked more than five hundred years ago!

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Re? Rool! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: We've followed your every step since your puppy mill birth in Coolsville! Strange and wonderful occurrences have always surrounded you, yes?

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Yeah yeah!

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: You’re a magnet for them, my hirsute friend! And at midnight tonight, most strange and wonderful of all...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A blinking black eye, beady, hollow, wet, and evil.

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: ++. you will bequeath your body to the future Lord and Master of this earthly realm: Talon fingers, curling in on themselves.

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Our blessed Demon Rex! Praise be! A purple tongue, slithering over a steely sharp beak.

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: For this is why you were called into being!

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: You_are the ultimate and holy bioorganic sacrifice! Scooby points his thumb at himself, grinning widely, too excited for words. He can’t believe his good luck.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: I’m a racririce?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shaggy, Fred, Velma and Daphne are in shock. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: Scooby-Doo is the Chosen One?~ -Velma nods.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: And the demons are going to take over everybody at midnight?

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: That’s what it says. Fred slumps down into the sand. Velma falls back against a tree. Daphne runs her hands through her hair.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Well, come on, like, let’s go!

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Where?

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: You know, to save Scooby and Isabel!

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: You want us to battle giant demons and save humanity? If you don’t recall, Shaggy, our area of expertise is nut jobs in Halloween costumes.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Well, I’m going to go save them. With or without the rest of you.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: You can’t be serious.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: I’m totally serious! What's happened to us?! We’re supposed to be heroes!

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: I’m too scared to be a hero.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: I was so scared when Chickenstein jumped at me out of that coffin I let loose a little dirt in my drawers -- blamed the smell on Scoob -- but still I went back for Daphne! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Daphne looks at him, moved.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Chickenstein wasn’t real!

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: They’ve all been real to me, man!

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: ‘Course is resistance to fear, not the absence of fear.’ Velma looks at Daphne.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: Mark Twain. Shaggy’s right.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: All right. I’m in too. Scooby’s our friend. But we need the Velmster.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: ‘The Velmster?!’ You think you’re going to sweet-talk me with my own nickname?! (erying) Try to make me feel... like part... of the group? (thinking, struck) We could set a trap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Velma opens a barn door to reveal a spotlight.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: We need a spotlight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fred takes a mirror off a hotel room wall.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA, (V.0O.)
dialogues.text: And mirrors.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: I could get on top of the cavern.  89.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daphne looks up at rappelling gear on a wall.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: With some rappelling gear.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: What about me? What should I do? Fred smiles, he remembers something:

dialogues.speaker: SPLIT-SCREEN
dialogues.text: On ONE SIDE of the SCREEN Shaggy expertly works the crane machine at the Coolsville Airport. On the OTHER SIDE Zarkos controls the similar Soul Snatcher, dropping a soul into the Soul Stew.

dialogues.speaker: FRED, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: I believe your vast knowledge of mechanical amusement devices will come in handy, my friend.

dialogues.speaker: FLASHBACK
dialogues.text: Zarkos uses a key to unlock the gate surrounding the control station.

dialogues.speaker: FRED, (V.0O.)
dialogues.text: But we need to get the key to the control box.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Mondavarious and Zarkos both have one. Fred nods. He puts his hand out in the center of the group. Shaggy puts his hand on his. Daphne puts her hand on Shaggy’s. Velma puts her hand on all of theirs.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Let’s get jinky with it.  90.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Humans adorn Scooby-Doo with garlands. They give him a manicure. A scantily clad woman feeds him Scooby Snacks as if they were grapes. He’s loving it. He sits ona _ gilded palanquin with a mattress and numerous pillows. He writes in a notebook, considering his newest equation: 12 +7 =a X2 n-2

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fred and Velma, wearing huge backpacks, are pretending to be demons. They each grip one of Shaggy’s arms, as if he’s their prisoner. Shaggy is scared witless.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Like, all right, you guys were right! Let’s forget this!

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Come on, you chicken.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: (to Velma) We can’t fool anybody! You don’t look like a demon! (to Fred) And neither do -- Fred has adapted a freaky glassy-eyed stare.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Hey, cut that out!

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Shhh!

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: It’s spooky enough in here without you making that face -- They turn a corner of the passageway and come to --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mondavarious sits on a sheet metal throne. Zarkos Superglues ceremonial stones to his sandals.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Ah! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Mondavarious spots them.

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: Mm. You've retrieved the beatnik. Escort him to the belly. Not that it matters. By the witching hour they’11 all be in our camp anyhow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daphne rappels James-Bond-style from a tall tree down toward the mountainous roof of the cavern. She wears her leather eggplant body suit, and has an enormous backpack. She lands on the mountain in a cat-like crouch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Velma, Fred and Shaggy venture into the enormous cavern. A DEMON stands beside one of the slabs, waiting to inhabit Shaggy’s body. Shaggy whispers through clenched teeth.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: This, like, isn’t cool! How are you going to get rid of that guy? Fred and Velma each draw two high-powered flashlights, one in each hand. They point the flashlights at the Demon. Four small beams appear on the monster. His skin smokes.

dialogues.speaker: DEMON
dialogues.text: Ahrloeg! He turns toward them, angry.

dialogues.speaker: DEMON
dialogues.text: Humans! You can’t kill me with beams that weak! The Demon rushes them, moving faster and faster. Fred and Velma stand their ground. The Demon gets closer. Fred and Velma slowly guide their four beams together into one spot on the demon’s chest, intensifying the light. The Demon grimaces in pain. He explodes.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: That’1l -- that’1ll work. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Fred and Velma throw their backpacks onto the ground and begin removing mirrors.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Shaggy, head into that passageway. Fred uses a tape measure and some chalk, marking off points on the walls surrounding them.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: There? Me? Why?

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: You. have to pretend that you've been transformed into a demon. That’s where they go afterwards. Velma hammers a nail into one of Fred’s chalk marks.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: I‘m like not an actor! I don’t know how to like get all looking like a demon looks!

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Just go, Shaggy. And then see if you can find Scooby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The possessed Raimondo and the Upper Crust Coed are in this room, a dark H.R. Giger beauty salon, replete with mirrors, hair goop galore, reptilian appliances, etc. Shaggy smiles uncomfortably, not knowing what to say. Raimondo shoves him into the chair. He speaks to Shaggy:

dialogues.speaker: RAIMONDO
dialogues.text: Fraeg orking a ba, lick. Shaggy stares at him, smiling nervously. He speaks in a somewhat shaky DJ-type voice.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: I‘d like to practice the form of ‘English, uh, thing known as a -- a question?

dialogues.speaker: RAIMONDO
dialogues.text: Sure. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Um... how do you tell the - difference between a demon in a human’s body, and a human in a human’s body?

dialogues.speaker: COED
dialogues.text: That’s easy. We don’t sweat. The Coed flicks ON an otherworldly ELECTRIC SHEARS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shaggy emerges from the makeover parlor. He wears an Izod shirt, khakis, and penny loafers. His hair is short, moussed, and perfectly feathered back. His goatee’s gone. He looks around the corridor. Humans move past him. He sees the preparatory enclave down the hall, where a happy Scooby is alone for a moment. He walks toward it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scooby sees Shaggy. His expression turns sour.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Scooby. They turned me into a total geek!

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: I’m not ralking to rou. Rou ralled re a roron.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: I’m sorry, Scooby. You’re my best friend, and I shouldn’t’ve... But we need your help.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: I’m ron’t reed to relp rou.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: That’s the only way we can get you out of here!

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: I ron’t rant to go! Rook! Rooby Racks! Scooby holds up his bag of Scooby Snacks. Shaggy automatically reaches for them. Scooby pulls them away. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Rone for rou! Rey reat me riff respect! Unlike rou!

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: They’re fooling you, Scoob!

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Ruh-uh! Rou’re realous! Rey rove Rooby-Doo!} (proudly) I’m a racririce!

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: A sacrifice? That’s a -- Shaggy sees a trio of humans approaching. He whispers:

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: The wrestler has a gold key! Get it if you can! Put it, I don’t know, under this mattress! Scooby just stares at him. The possessed humans push Shaggy out of the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fred and Velma are hanging the last of the mirrors on the wall. The mirrors travel all the way around the cavern.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: If this works it could be even cooler than the time we kicked the living shit out of Dick Van Dyke with the Cotton Candy Ghost.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: You mean, the time we kicked the shit out of the Cotton Candy Ghost with Dick Van Dyke. Fred stares at her, doubting.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Are you sure? A BLEATING HORN ECHOES throughout the cavern. Velma checks her watch.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Quarter to midnight. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Possessed humans file into the cavern from numerous passages encircling the cavern. Shaggy enters with them. He sees Velma and Fred and moves toward them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daphne props a large spotlight on a tripod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The humans stand stock-still in straight lines, staring in the direction of the vat. Fred and Velma, uncertain, line up with them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: whom we recognize from Garret’s photos, sits at a table in the library. She eyes a clock on the wall. She stands. Angel removes a talisman from her skirt. It is a stone image of the Magna Canis: Scooby-Doo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kenya students are playing basketball. One athlete dribbles down the court. He’s blocked. He turns and tosses the ball to a player, but the ball bounces off him. The player is standing completely still holding up a Magna Canis talisman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Teenagers perform Romeo and Juliet in front of a large audience. Romeo says his lines to the balcony.

dialogues.speaker: ROMEO
dialogues.text: That I were a glove upon that hand that I might touch that cheek! Romeo waits for Juliet’s response. But she’s staring like a zombie holding a talisman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A brother and sister, BRIAN and BETH ANNE, are standing holding talismans beside the dinner table. Their family is staring at them. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Beth Anne? Brian? -

dialogues.speaker: OLDER BROTHER
dialogues.text: Told you they’ve been acting weird.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fred watches Mondavarious use the key hanging from his belt to open the control station door. Shaggy gets in line beside him. He whispers:

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: I found Scooby. I told him to put the key under his mattress.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Mattress?

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Yeah. But I don’t know if he’s going to... oh, and another thing: don’t sweat.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Demons in human bodies don’t sweat.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: You can’t control sweating.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Sure you can.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: How?

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: I just, like, say, ‘Shaggy, man, don’t sweat.’

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: You can’t do that! No one can do that! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: I can. - (pointing at Fred’s hairline) Uh oh. I think that’s a little bit of sweat right there.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: I didn’t start sweating until you told me I couldn’t sweat!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zarkos enters the enclave. Shaggy sees a key sticking out of Zarkos’ pocket, just inches from his own face. He could grab it if he wanted. Scooby looks sad as memories travel through his mind:

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Velma’s right. You are a moron.

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: You’re the chosen one, Scooby-Doo!

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I’m sorry, Scoob. You’re my best friend. Zarkos looks at the trio of possessed humans.

dialogues.speaker: ZARKOS
dialogues.text: Let’s go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mondavarious stands in the control station box, wearing ceremonial garb. He closes his eyes in prayer.

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: Demon Rex, this eve your sweet servants gather in worshipful anticipation of your coming rule! Musicians drum. They play creepy, Dr. Seussian ancient instruments made of wood and metal. They chant.

dialogues.speaker: HUMANS
dialogues.text: A ringio a wado set. Shaggy, Velma and Fred are the only ones who don’t know the words. They try to fake it. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: HUMAN SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Ba bingam tom anani feet -.. Yah set la banani Ree kimio an rako ling Cha la ba kimo yeah la? This is what we demons This is the thing that sing! we say.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A waifish NORWEIGAN with a talisman chants beside her desk in a classroom of stunned students.

dialogues.speaker: NORWEIGAN/HUMANS, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Ko reeka gort an alla soy Go balli lala gingo hoy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An IRISH LAD holds the talisman, chanting along.

dialogues.speaker: IRISH LAD/HUMANS, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: A raefa morr ay ach otee...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beth Anne and Brian chant beside at the table.

dialogues.speaker: BETH ANNE/BRIAN
dialogues.text: This demon world forever be.

dialogues.speaker: OLDER BROTHER
dialogues.text: Tell me that’s not messed up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fred pretends to itch himself, wiping sweat from his face.

dialogues.speaker: HUMANS FRED
dialogues.text: A hinga hoowa karay lun I want to do your Bolevven tary pakin tun carryin’! Unleavened Roppoppo ee en loo en roo horray for tar! The Offer praise to Scooby- Pope-oh left the room. Doo! All for praise... what? Shaggy sees something in a passageway. Zarkos and the trio of possessed humans carrying the ceremonially adorned Scooby-Doo toward the center of the cavern belly. Scooby waves at the crowd as he passes, happy with his situation. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY HUMANS
dialogues.text: Rello... rello... rello... This i8 what we demons Rat rong is ratty! sing! They slide the palanquin into slots atop four short bambo poles in front of the Soul Stew. Velma looks at Shaggy, concerned.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA HUMANS
dialogues.text: Something tells me he The demon world forever didn’t get the key! He be! thinks this is a party! Zarkos and his charges grab onto Scooby’s arms and legs. Scooby looks suddenly worried.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY HUMANS
dialogues.text: Rait a recond! The demon world forever be! The quartet straps Scooby’s arms and legs onto the palanq The rear bamboo poles holding the palanquin aloft rise electronically, until the palanquin is vertical. Scooby-Doo is suspended in an X-shape.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY HUMANS
dialogues.text: Raggy!!! The demon world forever be! The possessed humans, all at once, open their mouths and screech hellishly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Japanese woman screeches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An Indian standing at an outdoor fruit stand, gripping a talisman, screeches. People around him grab their ears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The entire cavern begins to tremble. Scooby gazes up at the ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Ripes.  100.

dialogues.speaker: SERIES OF SHOTS
dialogues.text: An emerald beam of light shines down onto the talisman in Angel’s hands. Her TALISMAN EXPLODES: The Norwegian’s Scooby TALISMAN EXPLODES. The same emerald beam shines onto her talisman. Beth Anne and Brian’s TALISMANS EXPLODE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mondavarious gazes up at the ceiling, grinning. A huge hole in the CEILING EXPLODES, bursting upward, directly over the Soul Stew.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The spotlight topples to its side. Daphne covers her face. Rocks fly up past her and into the night sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Soul Stew rises behind a shivering Scooby. The soul heads form a swirling soul tube of SCREAMING HUMAN FACES. It twirls, twists, gaining speed, boring up through the hole, and toward the sky. Fred, Velma, and Shaggy watch the soul tube. TREMENDOUS WINDS BLOW throughout the cavern. The bottom of the tube lifts off of the metal vat: it bends outward, an open cavity aimed into the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daphne gazes up the long tube, leading further into the lightning-filled sky than she can see. Then she spots... The DEMON REX, a gargantuan, fiery, winged beast, streaking down through the center of the soul tube, rushing TOWARDS us. His black eyes are deep-set, hollow and wet. Deathly talons sprout from his wings. His thin disgusting tongue flips up over his face, slithering over his steely sharp beak. There is nothing beautiful about this creature. Nothing tender. Nothing good. And he is full of joy. A hellish horde of DEMONS in every shape, color, and size is on his tail. They YIP and HOLLER and HOWL.  101.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The demons emerge from the cavity at the bottom of the tube -- Hade’s cornucopia -- and they swamp the room. Velma eyes Fred.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Men in masks? You think?

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Wow. What if Bigfoot is real too? (embarrassed) I wrote that whole book. Some of these CREATURES look like monkeys, small and thin and ice blue. They cling to the walls, YIPPING. Others are skeletal and smirking, with body parts absent. Others are diseased. They drip pus.

dialogues.speaker: ZARKOS
dialogues.text: spots Daphne standing on the edge of the hole pushing the spotlight upright. He is alarmed.

dialogues.speaker: DEMON REX
dialogues.text: plants his huge, putrid body beside the shivering Scooby- Doo. He runs his scaly talons below Scooby’s chin.

dialogues.speaker: DEMON REX
dialogues.text: Good puppy.

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: Lord, it’s an honor to meet you. I’m Mon --

dialogues.speaker: DEMON REX
dialogues.text: Work the machinery, simp! Don’t waste time! Put me in the body! The Demon Rex grabs Scooby’s face in his taloned hand.

dialogues.speaker: DEMON REX
dialogues.text: I’m gonna be wearing your spots.

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: Yes, Lord, I... Mondavarious pushes the levers at the control station. The giant pincer rises into the air. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Shaggy and a perspiring Fred start toward Mondavarious. Velma stops them.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: No. Wait for the spotlight! That’s the plan!

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: It was supposed to happen already! Mondavarious guides the pincer into Scooby’s chest as Scooby whimpers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daphne aims the spotlight down in through the hole. She directs it at a...

dialogues.speaker: MIRROR
dialogues.text: on the wall. Suddenly, the mirror is knocked over by a blue MONKEY DEMON SCREECHING with celebratory rage.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: Darn! Daphne hears SOMETHING behind her. She turns. Zarkos is standing there.

dialogues.speaker: ZARKOS
dialogues.text: Sefiorita. Caught you again without your chi, have I not? Zarkos barrels toward her. Daphne tries to kick him. He grabs her ankle. She falls to her back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pincer yanks Scooby-Doo’s soul out of his body. The Demon Rex opens Scooby’s mouth like a lion tamer with a lion. He grins to the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: DEMON REX
dialogues.text: I’ve got my critics! But you gotta love this! The Demon Rex dives down into Scooby’s throat. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Scooby’s body begins to tremble. It burns black for a moment . - SCOOBY’S SOUL dangles from the pincer’s grip. He sees his body. His wispy spinal soul tail wags. SCOOBY’S SOUL Rey! Dat’s re! (eyeing Shaggy) Raggy! Hey, Raggy! Rook at me! I’m rust a head!

dialogues.speaker: VOLUPTUOUS WINGED FEMALE FISH DEMON
dialogues.text: tilts her head at Fred, staring quizzically. Fred sees her in his peripheral vision. His nervousness increases. He’s sopping with perspiration.

dialogues.speaker: PINCER
dialogues.text: inserts Scooby’s Soul in the soul tube. SCOOBY’S BODY pulses. His nostrils flare. His brow thickens. His soft eyes turn dark, evil. He burns the red color of hot charcoal. He grows to forty times his size. He snaps the straps, and lands on the floor like a cat. This is the SCOOBY REX: our childhood hero filtered through Satan’s eyes. His paw is the size of a man. Huge fangs protrude. He releases a terrifying growl. All the demons rejoice. Shaggy, Velma and Fred gaze at the control station. The Fish Demon lowers in the air in front of Fred, her wings flapping like a hummingbird’s. She points at him.

dialogues.speaker: FISH DEMON
dialogues.text: This one’s... sweating.

dialogues.speaker: ' FRED
dialogues.text: Shaggy, get to the control box! Velma, fix the mirror! I’11 see if Scooby put the key under the mattress! Shaggy, Velma, and Fred take off in different directions. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The Fish Demon screeches behind them, pointing them out. The demons grab at Shaggy, Velma, and Fred.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daphne does handsprings away from Zarkos. He handsprings after her, equally proficient. They stop in the same Place. She strikes him. He strikes her. She goes to punch him. He grabs her arm. He flips her down. He kneels on her chest, pinning her there. Smirks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fred dodges the demons like a running back. Velma slides under a flying monkey sweeping down at her. Shaggy is fast, diving between creatures. Then the Scooby Rex lands powerfully in front of him. The Rex stabs his enormous face into Shaggy’s.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY REX
dialogues.text: Who invited you to my sweet sixteen?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zarkos holds down Daphne. He pulls a piece of rope from his belt.

dialogues.speaker: ZARKOS
dialogues.text: I’1l bring you to the catacombs, tie you up and use you for bait for whoever you’re working with! Zarkos starts to tie her hands.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: Not -- Daphne frees her leg and kicks Zarkos in his head.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: This -- Zarkos stumbles. Daphne back-flips to standing. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: Time! -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zarkos comes toward her. With one swift flying, swirling kick to his chest, she knocks him backwards. Zarkos stumbles backwards, so that he almost topples into the hole in the roof. Daphne grabs the terrified wrestler by his suspenders. She drapes him over the open hole. His boots barely graze the ledge. The soul tube vacillates behind him. She puts her face in close to his.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: Now who's the damsel in distress?!

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: Straight up. Daphne drops him. He screams as he plummets to his demise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shaggy falls to the floor. The Scooby Rex raises his paw over him, to squash him, then stops. He sees Zarkos falling into the pit.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: runs toward the vertical palanquin. He leaps over a demon, and onto a small platform beneath it. He rips away the mattress (which is attached by Velcro). And there, scrawled in huge letters on the wood board, it reads: 12

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zarkos’ key rests on the inside rim. Fred smiles. SCOOBY’S SOUL twisting in the tunnel, chuckles.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Shaggy!  106.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY REX
dialogues.text: looks down to squash Shaggy, but he is no longer there. He looks over and sees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: standing at the control station. Fred tosses the key. It spins over the heads of the demons. Shaggy catches it. He goes to unlock the control station door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daphne flicks the switch on the spotlight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The beam shoots down into the room. It eradicates a few demons flying in its path. The beam impotently hits stone where the mirror fell. Velma, however, is standing beneath the beam. She casually picks up the mirror from the floor. The demons are staring at her.

dialogues.speaker: SKELETAL CREEP
dialogues.text: Who are you?!

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: The Velmster.

dialogues.speaker: MONKEY DEMON
dialogues.text: What are you?! Beat.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: I’m a hero. Velma thrusts the mirror high over her head. The spotlight strikes it. The beam reflects from the wall mirror to mirror to mirror throughout the room, a complex geometric pattern. It bursts through demons in its path, destroying almost all of them.  107.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: shoves Mondavarious out of the way. The control station controls are identical to the arcade crane controls at the airport. Shaggy confidently thrust a lever to the side. The pincer swoops over in front of the Scooby Rex.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: It’s one thing that you wanted to take over the world. The pincer jabs into a disconcerted Scooby Rex’s chest. it twists.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: But you shouldn’t have messed -- Shaggy wrenches the Demon Rex out of Scooby-Doo’ body. He swings the Demon Rex into the bottom of the soul tube.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: -- with my pet! Shaggy opens the pincer. The Demon Rex flies screaming into the tube, upward toward the sky. He is unable to grip onto the sides with his talons.

dialogues.speaker: DEMON REX
dialogues.text: Noooc0c00090000! All of the other demons, due to the Demon Rex’s gravitational force, are instantaneously yanked from their human forms. The bodies fall limp. The DEMONS WHOOSH into the tube behind the Demon Rex.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Irish Lad looks surprised for a moment, and then the demon’s soul is ripped from his body. It sweeps over the drinkers’ heads and through an open window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The astonished crowd watches as a huge, screaming demon flies over them and away from Juliet’s body. The demon flies out an open window and...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over the cityscape of Auckland.  108.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Demons rush in a blur to the island, one by one, from all directions, streaming toward the mountain entrance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Velma and Fred lie on the ground. They cover their heads as hundreds of DEMONS WOOSH over their bodies and up into the soul tube. And then it stops. The room is momentarily quiet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daphne stands before the soul tube. It is no longer twisting. The faces aren’t screaming. A woman’s soul stares at Daphne; she appears peaceful.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: Isabel?

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Thank you. The tube begins to crumble. The souls chip off and stream away in trichromatic colors, off into the night sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scooby-Doo’s Soul colorfully zooms across the cavern. SCOOBY’S SOUL Yeah yeah yeah! He splashes into his again normal-sized body, sparkling. In colorful bursts, the souls zip around a smiling Velma and Fred and out through the cavern’s halls.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: rappels down in through the hole of the roof. The colorful BALLS WHOOSH around her. Other souls enter other formerly-possessed bodies on the ground. They wake. They rise.  109.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY -DOO
dialogues.text: paws playfully at the bright balls zipping over his head.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: It's rootiful!

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: smiles at Mandy. She helps her up.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: gives Raimondo a hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd watches as a colorful ball of light travels over their heads and lands with a sparkling burst into the prone body of the Player. He opens his eyes, wondering where he is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Angel stands, running her hands over her body. Tears £ill her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Irish Lad whoops. He kisses a fat, ugly woman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Older Brother and Father embrace Beth Anne and Brian. They’re crying. The Mother grabs Brian’s chin.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: We wondered where you went. Brian rubs his hand over his crew cut.

dialogues.speaker: BRIAN
dialogues.text: I though you wanted me to cut off my hair.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: We loved you the way you were.  110.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone in the cavern is standing. Velma gives Shaggy a big bear hug. Someone taps him on the back. He turns to see Isabel. She’s crying.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Hey, cuz.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Izzy! Shaggy and Isabel embrace.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: gives Fred a little punch on the shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: We did it. Fred gives her a little punch back.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Yes, we did! They stop. They stare into each other’s eyes. Their breath quickens as their desire rushes to the surface. They embrace and kiss passionately. Then, as quickly as it started, Daphne catches her lapse of reason and pushes Fred away.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: Fred, cut your crap!

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Aha! You kissed me back!

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: No, I didn’t.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: (to a guy beside them) She used tongue.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: He's lying!

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY -DOO
dialogues.text: Wanders nervously through the jubilation, looking for someone. He hears a voice behind him: (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Scooby! Scooby turns, tongue wagging, legs splayed.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Raggy! Scooby gallops toward Shaggy. He leaps, flying through the air. He lands on Shaggy’s chest, knocking him over.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Rooby do good?!

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Yes, you did!

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Rooby rot a ronon?

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Like, not at all, buddy.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Raggy roves Rooby again?!

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: I always did.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: And Rooby roves Raggy! Scooby-Doo pins Shaggy there, licking his face. Shaggy laughs and protests the huge tongue, trying to stop it, but Scooby just can’t give his best friend enough love.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Ha hal Cut it out, Scoob! N‘GOO appears over Shaggy. A nearly-sobbing Mondavarious is by N‘Goo’s side. Scooby-Doo gulps, and, just like he did when Shaggy was stuck in the vase, he starts to run away. N‘Goo grabs Shaggy’s neck. He lifts him off the floor.

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: You! You have eradicated a lifetime’s worth of work! Kill him, N’Goo! Snap his neck like the weasel he is! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Shaggy can hardly breathe or speak.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Scoob...

dialogues.speaker: MONDAVARIOUS
dialogues.text: That mangy rodent? Ha! He’s a coward! Sniveling and shivering and shaking, like so much... Mondavarious and N’Goo hear a LOUD GROWLING. They turn. Scooby-Doo stands, haunched. The fur on his back is sticking up.. His fangs are exposed. He appears huge and frightening.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Reave Raggy rarone. He barrels toward them. Mondavarious and N’Goo’s expressions drop. They scream. Scooby-Doo is a saber-tooth tiger leaping at his prey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Press bulbs flash on Mondavarious and N’Goo. They are handcuffed and thoroughly beaten-up. A throng of CORRESPONDENTS gathers around the gang. They stick their microphones in Fred’s face.

dialogues.speaker: CORESPONDENT
dialogues.text: Fred, can you tell us how you masterminded the apprehension of Raphael Mondavarious?

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Yes! It all started when I was giving a speech at Coolsville, and -- Fred notices Velma standing quietly beside them, gazing at the floor.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: And I think, really, that the Velmster should take it from there. The Correspondents all thrust their mikes toward a surprised Velma. Her eyes smile warmly at Fred. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Yes. Firstly, we don’t believe there is any such person as Raphael Mondavarious. We came to the conclusion that he’s actually -- With the dexterity of Vanna White turning letters, Daphne pulls off the Mondavarious mask to reveal...

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Garret Rogers, Shaggy’s uncle. It makes sense: He wanted Scooby-Doo to be part of his evil plan, so he prodded us into coming to Spooky Island... At least that’s what we thought until we called Garret in Coolsville and he was still home. Consequently, this is just another mask covering his real identity -- Daphne pulls a Garret mask off to reveal...

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Fred Jones, who set up the whole situation just so Mystery Ink would return to the spotlight! PAN TO Fred, who is hurt by the accusation.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: But I’m standing right here.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Right. It was ludicrous that we suspected Fred, since we’ve often seen he and Mondavarious together. So it could only be the one person so unmercifully nefarious as to concoct this evil scheme. Daphne yanks off the Fred mask to reveal...

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Don Knotts!

dialogues.speaker: CORESPONDENT
dialogues.text: Mr. Furley? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: DON KNOTTS
dialogues.text: And I would have gotten away with it, too, if not for these meddling kids! They’re horrid! You should have seen what that disgusting animal did at my Christmas party! (re: Fred) And him! I figured out the mystery of Moody Manner and he took all the credit!

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Sorry, Don. But that’s no reason to freak out like a jerk and kill humanity.

dialogues.speaker: DON KNOTTS
dialogues.text: L tts! IF am master of hell! All_ shall bow before my unyielding power! You stupid sons-of-bi--! The TV shuts OFF. INT. DAPHNE’S DINING ROOM - DAY Daphne removes the videotape from the player. Velma, Shaggy, Fred, and Scooby are sitting around a dining room table with empty plates and glasses. Shaggy is wearing a green T-shirt with a demon eating a baby’s head on it. They applaud and laugh.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: I know we’ve seen it before, but every time I really get a kick...

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Velmster did a bang-up job. It’s no surprise that Yale offered her that professorship.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: You hear about Fred? They look at him.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Not to toot my own horn, but I’ve pre-sold two hundred thousand copies of my new book, Why Skeptics Suck Ass.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Groovy! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Daphne looks at her watch.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: Shoot! I’ve got to go. Sorry. I’ve got rehearsal.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Rehearsal?

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Daphne got cast as the lead in the new action flick, Mean Hard Revenge II. Scooby-Doo does some kung-fu moves.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Roh! Hee-rah! Everyone laughs. Not looking where he’s throwing his Scooby chops Shaggy in the face.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Ow!

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Rorry. EXT. DAPHNE’S HOUSE - MOMENTS LATER The gang crosses the lawn, toward their cars. The Mystery Machine is in the driveway.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Thanks. for lunch, Daph. That was nice of you!

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Yeah yeah yeah! Ranks!

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: I hope we can make it a regular thing. Velma opens her car door. She stops.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Shaggy, you didn’t say what you were doing. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Oh, like, nothing much. Scooby and me, we just got a, you know, mysterious call.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: A mysterious call?

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: I don’t know. They said they were from the Jell-O pudding factory and there were some sort of sightings of, like, a Jell-o Chocolate Pudding monster. Then they hung up.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Yeah yeah. Rell-o! Everyone stops and looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: Oh.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Hm... Well, good-bye, everybody.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY VELMA
dialogues.text: See ya! So long, folks.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Bye. Rye-rye! Fred steps into the Mystery Machine. Velma gets into her Dodge. Daphne walks toward the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shaggy and Scooby head down the sidewalk.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Shaggy! They turn to see Daphne behind them.

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: What kind of chocolate pudding monster? Velma pulls her Dodge in front of them. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: That’s what I was thinking! Is it a monster... or could it be a ghost?

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Like, it’s probably just a man in a mas--

dialogues.speaker: FRED, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Don’t jump to conclusions, Shag! Fred steps out of the Mystery Machine behind Shaggy.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: If you expect it to be a man ina mask, then when it ends up being a protoplasmic alien life form animating an edible substance, it’ll take you unaware, perhaps shooting acidic wads of pudding at your head, tearing off your face!

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: That’s exactly what Scooby said! Scooby-Doo gives Fred the thumbs-up. Velma pulls out a cell phone. Dials it.

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: This sounds pretty serious. You might need, you know... (to phone) Sarah? Velma Dinkley. I’m not going to be in for a couple weeks...

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: Right. I can always be in Mean Hard Revenge TIT.

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: This could be dangerous. Someone of my physical prowess could come in handy, opening lodged doors, etcetera. Shaggy shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Sure. Fred claps. The gang moves toward the Mystery Machine. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: FRED
dialogues.text: Ha! Chocolate pudding bastard, here we come! I’11 drive!

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Shotgun!

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE
dialogues.text: Darn it! I was going to say that!

dialogues.speaker: VELMA
dialogues.text: Why don’t we all just ride in the front seat?! Fred, Daphne, and Velma jump into the Mystery Machine. Scooby-Doo and Shaggy trot toward the van after them. Scooby looks up at his beatnik pal.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Raggy. Dere’s no rocolate rudding ronster.

dialogues.speaker: SHAGGY
dialogues.text: Like, no, Scooby, there isn’t. But, they all looked, like, sad. After all, it’s better than chasing nothing with your friends, than to chase something with no one at all. Scooby smiles. He bounds toward the Mystery Machine.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY
dialogues.text: Rooby-Dooby-Doo! Scooby and Shaggy hop into the van. They close the door.

dialogues.speaker: FRED, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Ha ha! Do that again, Scoob!

dialogues.speaker: SCOOBY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Rooby-Dooby-Doo!

dialogues.speaker: FRED, (0.8.)
dialogues.text: I’m going to start doing that. Fred!

dialogues.speaker: DAPHNE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Fred, please don’t!

dialogues.speaker: FRED, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Fred Jones! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: _ DAPHNE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: It’s his thing. Why do you have to steal everybody else’s thing?

dialogues.speaker: FRED, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Sorry, sorry... The Mystery Machine hits the road. FADE OUT.
